meanings.definition: A pair of two similar or identical items.
meanings.sent1: I found a box with two doubletons of socks inside.
meanings.sent2: She always wears doubletons of earrings to match her outfits.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone brought doubletons of cupcakes, making it a sweet event.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a pair of doubletons, always together and inseparable.
meanings.sent5: The store displayed doubletons of shoes in various colors, tempting shoppers to buy more.

meanings.definition: A set of two cards of the same rank in a game of bridge.
meanings.sent1: In bridge, having doubletons of aces can greatly improve your chances of winning.
meanings.sent2: The player proudly revealed their doubletons of kings during the game.
meanings.sent3: The bridge tournament ended in a tie when both players had doubletons of queens.
meanings.sent4: His luck seemed to be a doubletons of jacks, always showing up at the right time.
meanings.sent5: The strategy involved holding onto doubletons of spades until the perfect moment to play them.
